response.overview: The Flaming Horse is an image-based project created during 2021-2022, developed in the form of a four-chapter film, and a photo-book. It is an autobiographical project consisted of personal archival documentations employed as lyrical reflections embodied in a collection of images that are meant to describe a descending state of my life in which I happen to find myself within an abysmal crave for care and warmth, while trying to familiarise with the health and mental downfalls inside my precious family.
response.title: The Flaming Horse
